allow: Bash(".venv/Scripts/python.exe" -c "import os; os.environ[''ONCRAWL_API_TOKEN''] = ''04Q56SGGKZVXAZFKUR9JC0Q5GZCOAY1VA6O05POX''; from oncrawl_client import OnCrawlClient; print\(''Client initialized successfully''\); client = OnCrawlClient\(\); print\(''API token loaded:'', client.api_token[:10] + ''...''\)")

Bash(.venv/Scripts/python.exe -c "import os; os.environ[''ONCRAWL_API_TOKEN''] = ''04Q56SGGKZVXAZFKUR9JC0Q5GZCOAY1VA6O05POX''; from oncrawl_mcp_server.oncrawl_client import OnCrawlClient; client = OnCrawlClient\(\); result = client.search_links\(''6952431a3d6fc5e120f87470'', fields=[''origin'', ''target'', ''anchor'', ''follow''], oql={''field'': [''target'', ''contains'', ''/prediction'']}, limit=100\); import csv; with open\(''prediction_market_links.csv'', ''w'', newline='''', encoding=''utf-8''\) as f: writer = csv.DictWriter\(f, fieldnames=[''source_page'', ''destination_page'', ''anchor_text'', ''follow'']\); writer.writeheader\(\); [writer.writerow\({''source_page'': link[''origin''], ''destination_page'': link[''target''], ''anchor_text'': link.get\(''anchor'', ''''\), ''follow'': link.get\(''follow'', ''''\)}\) for link in result.get\(''links'', []\)]; print\(f''Exported {len\(result.get\(""links"", []\)\)} links to prediction_market_links.csv''\)")
